content: Write a paragraph about rainbows using only words that begin with vowels.

An enchanting aura embraces the atmosphere, as an arc of iridescent beauty graces the sky. Often observed after a gentle shower, this natural phenomenon captivates onlookers with its spectrum of colors. Each hue blends seamlessly into the next, creating a mesmerizing display that spans the sky. The formation of a rainbow is a marvel of optics, involving the reflection, refraction, and dispersion of light within water droplets. This celestial spectacle not only brings joy to those who witness it but also symbolizes hope and renewal in various cultures around the world.
